inclusion.criterion: Surgical indication justifying protatique prostatectomy, or complete prostatocystectomie, or removal of a metastasis of prostate cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients affiliated to a social security scheme or benefiting from such a regime.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have given their consent to participate in writing
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient received local therapy or hormonal treatment (LHRH analogue, therapy blocking androgen receptors) before surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment reductase inhibitors 5ARI ongoing or stopped for less than 3 months before the intervention.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient included in another clinical trial inconsistent with the conduct of this research.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient receiving treatment that could interfere with hormone levels (Prednisone, Ketoconazole, Abiraterone, Finasteride, Dutasteride).
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 63-year-old man presenting to the Emergency Department with a history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days. He is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP.
